bug.short_desc: Excessive language data should be removed from distribution or put some other place

long_desc.thetext:
Strings for the test package should be put in a separate .p file and not be included in the main distribution! Space saving! Here is the text strings in the .po file.
#: qx/test/locale/Locale.js:85 #: qx/test/locale/Locale.js:88 #: qx/test/locale/Locale.js:91 msgid "test One car" msgstr "test %1 cars"
#: qx/test/locale/Locale.js:148 msgid "one" msgstr "yksi"
#: qx/test/locale/Locale.js:149 msgid "two" msgstr "kaksi"
#: qx/test/ui/LocaleSwitch.js:85 #: qx/test/ui/LocaleSwitch.js:115 #: qx/test/locale/Locale.js:73 msgid "test one" msgstr "testaa yksi"
#: qx/test/ui/LocaleSwitch.js:93 #: qx/test/locale/Locale.js:77 #: qx/test/locale/Locale.js:81 msgid "test Hello %1!" msgstr "testaa Hello %1!"
#: qx/test/ui/LocaleSwitch.js:93 #: qx/test/locale/Locale.js:81 msgid "test Jonny" msgstr "testaa Jonny"
#: qx/test/ui/LocaleSwitch.js:99 msgid "test two" msgstr "testaa kaksi"
thanks for the hint. Could save some space in deed.
Move open issues to RESOLVED â€“ LATER, whose last comment is older than a year.
